page.title: 09EVENTS IN HANDCROSS
page.content: In Handcross there are many events a year, they are usually held in the recreation ground.One of the popular events is the Jumble sale. We have 2 Jumble sales a year at school and we have some in the village hall for Brownies and for charity.At our school we have sports day where either friends or relatives come and watch children of our school run in races against each other.The sack race is fun.One person gets into a sack and races against the other person.We have Maypole dancing at our school on May the 1st.Every year we either have a Christmas play or Easter play.On May 8th which was the 40th anniversary of V.E.day some people had a street party.In the summer we have a village fete and flower show.
